summary_text: Many autistic adults in Oregon are invisible, marginalized, and struggling. We can fix this.
main_image_alt_text: Chart showing population of adults in oregon receiving I/DD services and/or autistic.

summary_text: Autism is Lifelong. Support and Research Haven’t Been. We are just starting to learn what successful adulthood looks like for autistic people.
main_image_alt_text: Plot of autism research funding by category from 2010 to 2020. Data from the IACC.

summary_text: Autistic adults face a multitude of significant and endemic challenges.
thumbnail_alt_text: Thumbnail: Dr. Bones McCoy trying to safe Klingon General Gorkon in the Star Treck movie _The Undiscovered Country_
main_image_alt_text: Dr. Bones McCoy trying to safe Klingon General Gorkon in the Star Treck movie _The Undiscovered Country_.

summary_text: The autistic community has the talent and ability to create solutions NOW. “Actually Autistic” adults are not what you see on TV.
Working from within the autistic community, we will focus on four attainable objectives that will directly and immediately improve the lives of Oregon's autistic adults.
thumbnail_alt_text: thumbnail: pathway watercolor by Alexandria Levin
